nodes.text: The Valarian hackers' bunker was an outpost on the Outer Rim world of Tatooine used by hackers in the criminal organization known as the Valarian gang during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was located a short distance south of the town of Wayfar, and west of Romo Vax's hideout. Circa 1 ABY, the bunker was attacked by Bib Fortuna's henchmen because a Sennex spy known as Romo Vax claimed that the Valarian hackers had stolen information belonging to Jabba the Hutt.
The Valarian hackers' bunker was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
